original_text: Yet they would not listen to their judges but prostituted themselves to other gods and worshiped them. They quickly turned from the ways of their ancestors, who had been obedient to the Lord’s commands.
korean_text: 그들이 그 사사들에게도 순종하지 아니하고 오히려 다른 신들을 따라가 음행하며 그들에게 절하고 여호와의 명령을 순종하던 그들의 조상들이 행하던 길에서 속히 치우쳐 떠나서 그와 같이 행하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Yet they would not listen to their judges
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 재판관들의 말을 듣지 않았다

sentences.original_text: but prostituted themselves to other gods
They quickly turned from the ways of their ancestors
who had been obedient to the Lord's commands
